Text:
Ja Rule must appear in court in August, where he will stand trial for a firearm violation 
in New York. He pleaded not guilty to criminal possession of a weapon.

Lil Wayne, Also Ft. on this CD was arrested by the NYPD on the same night in question, 
in a separate incident. Ja Rule will stand trial on the gun charge on August 18th. If convicted, 
he faces up to 4 years in prison...

For Promotional Use Only... Remember to support the artists...
Anyway enjoy the Music,it is free!!!!

Jeffrey Atkins is his REAL NAME.

Stupid F@ckers.
